name: multi_turn_15
requirements: Execute ONLY the explicitly requested state modifications. Use exact values as specified: numbers as integers/floats (not strings), strings in quotes. For stats dict, use ONLY the key names from the Variable description - never invent new keys. When setting boolean-like values, use integers (1 for true, 0 for false) unless explicitly told otherwise. Do not add unrequested keys or modify unrequested variables.

turns.query: Starting space mission 'Odyssey' in pre_launch status at level 1. Set active to true, score to 0. Add 'mission_created' to history. Initialize stats with crew: 6 and fuel: 100.
Launch successful! Set status to 'launched', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'launched' to history. Subtract 5 from fuel, add altitude: 100 to stats.
Reached orbit! Set status to 'orbit', increase level by 1, add 150 to score. Append 'reached_orbit' to history. Subtract 10 from fuel, set altitude to 400.
Docked with ISS! Set status to 'docked', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'docked_iss' to history. Subtract 5 from fuel, add samples: 0.
Spacewalk complete! Set status to 'eva', increase level by 1, add 250 to score. Append 'spacewalk' to history. Set samples to 5, keep fuel and altitude.
Departing for the Moon! Set status to 'transit_moon', increase level by 1, add 250 to score. Append 'departed_iss' to history. Subtract 20 from fuel, set altitude to 10000.
Entered lunar orbit! Set status to 'lunar_orbit', increase level by 1, add 500 to score. Append 'lunar_orbit' to history. Subtract 15 from fuel, set altitude to 100.
Moon landing! Set status to 'lunar_surface', increase level by 1, add 1000 to score. Append 'moon_landing' to history. Subtract 10 from fuel, set altitude to 0, add moonwalks: 0.
First moonwalk complete! Set status to 'lunar_exploration', increase level by 1, add 1000 to score. Append 'first_moonwalk' to history. Add 15 to samples, add 1 to moonwalks.
Lunar base established! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 1500 to score. Append 'base_established' to history. Add 30 to samples, add 2 to moonwalks, add base: true.
Lifting off from Moon! Set status to 'lunar_ascent', increase level by 1, add 1000 to score. Append 'lunar_liftoff' to history. Subtract 10 from fuel, set altitude to 100.
Earth transit begun! Set status to 'transit_earth', increase level by 1, add 1500 to score. Append 'earth_transit' to history. Subtract 10 from fuel, set altitude to 200000.
Atmospheric reentry! Set status to 'reentry', increase level by 1, add 1500 to score. Append 'reentry' to history. Subtract 10 from fuel, set altitude to 100.
Splashdown successful! Set status to 'splashdown', increase level by 1, add 1000 to score. Append 'splashdown' to history. Set fuel to 0, set altitude to 0.

Mission complete with heroes welcome! Append ' [LEGENDARY]' to name. Set status to 'mission_complete', increase level by 1, add 5000 to score. Set active to false. Append 'heroes_welcome' to history. Add medals: 6 to stats.
Starting food truck business 'Tasty Bites' in food_truck status at level 1. Set active to true, score to 0. Add 'started' to history. Initialize stats with staff: 2 and revenue: 0.
First sales day! Keep status and level, add 50 to score. Append 'first_sale' to history. Add 500 to revenue, add customers: 50.
Got a catering gig! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'catering_gig' to history. Add 1 to staff, add 1500 to revenue, add 150 to customers.
Opened pop-up location! Set status to 'pop_up', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'pop_up_opened' to history. Add 2 to staff, add 3000 to revenue, add 300 to customers, add rating: 4.2.
Got a viral review! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 200 to score. Append 'viral_review' to history. Triple revenue, triple customers, increase rating by 0.3.
Opened permanent restaurant! Set status to 'restaurant', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'restaurant_opened' to history. Add 7 to staff, double revenue, double customers, add seats: 40.
Hired executive chef! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 500 to score. Append 'chef_hired' to history. Add 3 to staff, add 20000 to revenue, add 2000 to customers, increase rating by 0.1.

Nominated for local award! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 1000 to score. Append 'award_nominated' to history. Add 30000 to revenue, add 3000 to customers, increase rating by 0.1, add awards: 0.

Won the award! Set status to 'acclaimed', increase level by 1, add 1500 to score. Append 'award_won' to history. Add 3 to staff, add 40000 to revenue, add 4000 to customers, increase rating by 0.1, add 10 to seats, add 1 to awards.
Planning expansion! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 2000 to score. Append 'expansion_planned' to history. Add 60000 to revenue, add 6000 to customers, add locations: 1.

Second location opened! Set status to 'chain', increase level by 1, add 2000 to score. Append 'second_location' to history. Add 12 to staff, add 120000 to revenue, add 12000 to customers, add 40 to seats, add 1 to locations.

Launched franchise model! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 2000 to score. Append 'franchise_model' to history. Add 20 to staff, add 200000 to revenue, add 20000 to customers, decrease rating by 0.1, add 60 to seats, add 1 to awards, add 3 to locations.

TV appearance on cooking show! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 5000 to score. Append 'tv_appearance' to history. Add 30 to staff, double revenue, double customers, add 100 to seats, add 5 to locations.

International expansion! Set status to 'empire', increase level by 1, add 5000 to score. Append 'international' to history. Add 70 to staff, double revenue, double customers, decrease rating by 0.1, add 250 to seats, add 1 to awards, add 10 to locations.

Earned Michelin star! Append ' [MICHELIN]' to name. Set status to 'legendary', increase level by 2, add 10000 to score. Set active to false. Append 'michelin_star' to history. Add 50 to staff, add 3000000 to revenue, add 300000 to customers, increase rating by 0.3, add 100 to seats, add 2 to awards, add 5 to locations, add stars: 1.
Starting band called 'Luna' as amateur at level 1. Set active to true, score to 0. Add 'started_band' to history. Initialize stats with fans: 0 and songs: 0.
Wrote first song! Keep status and level, add 10 to score. Append 'first_song' to history. Add 10 to fans, add 1 to songs, add streams: 100.
First live gig! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 20 to score. Append 'first_gig' to history. Add 40 to fans, add 2 to songs, add 400 to streams, add gigs: 1.
Building local following! Set status to 'local', increase level by 1, add 50 to score. Append 'local_following' to history. Add 150 to fans, add 2 to songs, add 1500 to streams, add 4 to gigs.
Released first EP! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'ep_released' to history. Add 300 to fans, add 3 to songs, add 8000 to streams, add 5 to gigs, add albums: 1.
Signed record deal! Set status to 'signed', increase level by 1, add 320 to score. Append 'record_deal' to history. Add 1500 to fans, add 40000 to streams, add 5 to gigs.
Debut album released! Keep status, increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'debut_album' to history. Add 8000 to fans, add 7 to songs, add 150000 to streams, add 5 to gigs, add 1 to albums.
First national tour! Set status to 'touring', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'first_tour' to history. Add 15000 to fans, add 300000 to streams, add 20 to gigs, add tours: 1.
Hit single goes viral! Keep status, increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'hit_single' to history. Add 75000 to fans, add 3 to songs, add 1500000 to streams, add 10 to gigs, add hits: 1.

Nominated for music award! Set status to 'famous', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'award_nomination' to history. Add 150000 to fans, add 2 to songs, add 3000000 to streams, add 10 to gigs, add 1 to albums, add 1 to tours, add 1 to hits, add awards: 0.
Won the award! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 4000 to score. Append 'award_won' to history. Double fans, add 2 to songs, double streams, add 15 to gigs, add 1 to hits, add 1 to awards.

World tour announced! Set status to 'star', increase level by 1, add 8000 to score. Append 'world_tour' to history. Double fans, add 3 to songs, add 15000000 to streams, add 25 to gigs, add 1 to albums, add 1 to tours, add 2 to hits, add 1 to awards.

Album goes platinum! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 15000 to score. Append 'platinum_album' to history. Double fans, add 3 to songs, double streams, add 20 to gigs, add 2 to hits, add 1 to awards, add platinum: 1.

Headlining major festival! Set status to 'superstar', increase level by 2, add 15000 to score. Append 'headliner' to history. Add 3000000 to fans, add 4 to songs, double streams, add 30 to gigs, add 1 to albums, add 2 to tours, add 3 to hits, add 2 to awards, add 2 to platinum.

Inducted into Hall of Fame! Append ' [HALL OF FAME]' to name. Set status to 'legend', increase level by 1, double the score. Set active to false. Append 'hall_of_fame' to history. Double fans, add 8 to songs, double streams, add 50 to gigs, add 1 to albums, add 1 to tours, add 5 to hits, add 5 to awards, add 2 to platinum, add diamond: 1.
Starting drug development! Set name to 'Nexavir', status to 'discovery', level to 1. Set active to true, score to 0. Add 'discovered' to history. Initialize stats with patients: 0 and trials: 0.
Preclinical testing begins! Set status to 'preclinical', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'preclinical_start' to history. Add mice: 50, add efficacy: 60.
Preclinical results promising! Set status to 'ind_filing', increase level by 1, add 150 to score. Append 'preclinical_success' to history. Add 50 to mice, increase efficacy by 10, add toxicity: 10.
IND approved, Phase 1 begins! Set status to 'phase1', increase level by 1, add 250 to score. Append 'phase1_start' to history. Add 20 to patients, add 1 to trials, add sites: 3.

Phase 1 completed safely! Keep status, increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'phase1_complete' to history. Add 10 to patients, increase efficacy by 5, subtract 2 from toxicity, add adverse_events: 2.
Phase 2 trial initiated! Set status to 'phase2', increase level by 1, add 500 to score. Append 'phase2_start' to history. Add 70 to patients, add 1 to trials, add 5 to sites.
Phase 2 interim results positive! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 500 to score. Append 'phase2_interim' to history. Add 100 to patients, increase efficacy by 5, add 3 to adverse_events.
Phase 2 complete with strong efficacy! Keep status, increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'phase2_complete' to history. Add 50 to patients, increase efficacy by 5, subtract 2 from toxicity.
Phase 3 mega-trial launched! Set status to 'phase3', increase level by 1, add 2000 to score. Append 'phase3_start' to history. Add 500 to patients, add 1 to trials, add 20 to sites.
Phase 3 enrollment complete! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 2000 to score. Append 'phase3_enrolled' to history. Add 1500 to patients, add 30 to sites, add countries: 12.
Phase 3 interim analysis positive! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 2000 to score. Append 'phase3_interim' to history. Add 500 to patients, increase efficacy by 3, add 3 to adverse_events.

Phase 3 primary endpoint met! Set status to 'nda_prep', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'phase3_success' to history. Add 500 to patients, increase efficacy by 4, subtract 1 from toxicity.
NDA submitted to FDA! Set status to 'fda_review', increase level by 1, add 1000 to score. Append 'nda_submitted' to history. Add reviewers: 15.
FDA advisory committee votes favorably! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 1000 to score. Append 'advisory_positive' to history. Add votes: 12.
FDA approval granted! Prepend '[FDA] ' to name. Set status to 'approved', increase level by 1, triple the score. Set active to false. Append 'fda_approved' to history. Add approval_year: 2024.
Starting game development! Set name to 'Ethereal', status to 'concept', level to 1. Set active to true, score to 0. Add 'conceived' to history. Initialize stats with devs: 3 and bugs: 0.
Prototype completed! Set status to 'prototype', increase level by 1, add 50 to score. Append 'prototype_done' to history. Add 2 to devs, add 20 to bugs, add features: 5.

Vertical slice demo ready! Set status to 'vertical_slice', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'vertical_slice' to history. Add 3 to devs, add 30 to bugs, add 10 to features, add playtime: 1.
Alpha build complete! Set status to 'alpha', increase level by 1, add 150 to score. Append 'alpha_build' to history. Add 4 to devs, add 50 to bugs, add 15 to features, add 2 to playtime.

Team expansion for production! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 200 to score. Append 'team_expanded' to history. Add 8 to devs, add 50 to bugs, add 10 to features, add 2 to playtime, add artists: 8.

Beta build achieved! Set status to 'beta', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'beta_build' to history. Add 5 to devs, add 100 to bugs, add 20 to features, add 5 to playtime, add 4 to artists.
Closed beta testing started! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 500 to score. Append 'closed_beta' to history. Subtract 50 from bugs, add 5 to features, add 2 to playtime, add testers: 500.
Open beta launched! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 500 to score. Append 'open_beta' to history. Add 300 to bugs, add 5 to features, add 3 to playtime, add 9500 to testers.
Bug fixing sprint! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 500 to score. Append 'bug_fixing' to history. Add 5 to devs, subtract 400 from bugs, add 2 to features, add 5000 to testers.
Gold master achieved! Set status to 'gold', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'gold_master' to history. Subtract 70 from bugs, add 5 to playtime, add 5000 to testers.
Day one patch prepared! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 500 to score. Append 'day_one_patch' to history. Subtract 20 from bugs, add 3 to features, add patches: 1.
Game launched worldwide! Set status to 'launched', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'launched' to history. Add 20 to bugs, add sales: 100000, add reviews: 85.

Post-launch support update! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 3000 to score. Append 'post_launch' to history. Subtract 15 from bugs, add 5 to features, add 2 to patches, add 400000 to sales, add 3 to reviews.

Major DLC expansion released! Keep status, increase level by 1, add 3000 to score. Append 'dlc_released' to history. Add 5 to bugs, add 20 to features, add 10 to playtime, add 1 to patches, add 300000 to sales, add 2 to reviews, add dlc: 1.

Game of the Year winner! Append ' [GOTY]' to name. Set status to 'legendary', increase level by 1, triple the score. Set active to false. Append 'goty_winner' to history. Double sales, add 5 to reviews, add 1 to dlc, add awards: 5.
